d3f:UserAccountPermissions.d3f:definition: Restricting a user account's access to resources.
d3f:UserAccountPermissions.rdfs:label: User Account Permissions

@graph.d3f:kb-abstract: When deployed on Windows Server, Windows Admin Center provides a centralized point of management for your server environment. By controlling access to Windows Admin Center, you can improve the security of your management landscape.
@graph.d3f:kb-reference-title: Configure User Access Control and Permissions
@graph.rdfs:label: Reference - Configure User Access Control and Permissions
